title: Migrate Trading System from Hetzner to MacBook Air
description: Moved all files from old Hetzner server (5.161.231.205) to local MacBook Air. Two folders: allfilestradingsystem202601310015/ and completedocumentationpackageallmarkdownfiles/. All 16 Python tools reorganized into trading/.

title: Gmail Integration (IMAP + SMTP)
description: Connected rara3bot@gmail.com via app password. Creds saved to .gmail-creds.json. Default recipient: llctechboost@gmail.com. 16 messages in inbox. Sending works.

title: Google Cloud Service Account Setup
description: Project dash-485802 with service account key (dash-485802-9d0410e86e65.json). Sheets API works. OAuth client also in project rara-485713 (unused for now).

title: Fix Scanner V3 — HTF False Positives
description: Raised HTF threshold from 15% to 40% advance. Before: 45 false breakouts. After: 0. Verified with full scan.

title: Fix Scanner V3 — Score Overflow (13/12)
description: Capped max score at 12. Was showing 13/12 for GOOGL due to double-counting. Verified.

title: Fix Scanner V3 — Duplicate Buy Points
description: Stocks appearing in both Breakouts AND Bases sections. Deduped — each stock now in ONE section only.

title: Fix Scanner V3 — RS Rating on Small Universe
description: RS Rating was broken with <20 stocks (percentile math fails). Added absolute thresholds for small sample sizes.

title: Add Earnings Proximity Warning to Scanner
description: Flags stocks with earnings within 14 days with ⚠️. Prevents entering trades before earnings reports.

title: Signal Matcher Earnings Penalty
description: Signal matcher now penalizes stocks near earnings: -25 pts for ≤7 days, -15 pts for ≤14 days. Also penalizes bearish flow on bullish signals.

title: Fix Dashboard Text Parser
description: Dashboard was showing empty patterns and bogus 'RS' cards. Fixed text parsing logic.

title: Stock Scanner Dashboard (Port 5000)
description: Full dashboard showing scan results, patterns, buy points, signal scores. Running at localhost:5000.

title: Kanban Task Board Dashboard (Port 5001)
description: Jira-style kanban with drag-and-drop, filters, REST API, keyboard shortcuts. Dark theme. Running at localhost:5001.

title: Activity Log Dashboard (Port 5002)
description: Activity/event log dashboard. Running at localhost:5002.

title: Build morning_briefing.py
description: One-command full pipeline: runs scanner, money scanner, options flow, signal matcher, chart intel, generates briefing report.

title: Build sector_rotation.py
description: Tracks money flow across 11 sectors. Identifies leading vs lagging sectors. Built by sub-agent.

title: Build earnings_calendar.py
description: Earnings calendar tracker for the ticker universe. Built by sub-agent.

title: Build dark_pool_tracker.py
description: Reveals institutional accumulation via dark pool data. Built by sub-agent.

title: Build signal_tracker.py
description: Records every signal and tracks win/loss rates by pattern type over time. signal_history.db created.

title: Build chart_screenshotter.py
description: Takes TradingView daily chart screenshots for stocks scoring 8+ from scanner. Saves to charts/ with timestamps.

title: Build chart_vision.py
description: AI-powered pattern recognition using vision model. Grades patterns A/B/C/F. Detects VCPs math scanner can't see.

title: Build chart_intel.py
description: Combines scanner data + chart screenshots + vision analysis + market context into one-stop intel report per stock.

title: CANSLIM Visual Guide with AI Chart Examples
description: Complete pattern guide covering all 7 patterns with real chart screenshots (NVDA, NFLX, META, CELH, GOOGL, AMD, NU) + AI vision analysis. Emailed v2 to Rah.

title: Cloudflare Tunnel Setup (External Access)
description: Attempted Cloudflare tunnels for external dashboard access. Failed — needs further config. Deprioritized in favor of local WiFi.

title: Tailscale VPN Setup
description: Attempted Tailscale install for remote access. Failed — needs sudo password for pkg installer. Deprioritized.

title: Local WiFi Dashboard Access
description: All dashboards accessible at 192.168.1.179:5000/5001/5002 from any device on same WiFi. Flask binds to 0.0.0.0.

title: Fix Kanban Board — Empty Tasks Bug
description: tasks.json used 'column' field but JS expected 'status'. Fixed field name. Also seeded with all project tasks.

title: Alpaca Paper Trading Integration
description: Connect Alpaca API for paper trading execution. Need API keys from Rah. Will enable automated order placement based on scanner signals.
blockers: Need Alpaca API keys from Rah

title: Expand Ticker Universe Beyond 71
description: Current scanner covers 71 tickers. Expand to full S&P 500 or broader market. May need data provider upgrade.

title: Morning Briefing Cron Jobs (3x Daily)
description: Set up automated morning_briefing.py runs: pre-market (8:30 AM), midday (12:00 PM), after-close (4:30 PM). Deliver via Telegram.

title: Conversational Trading Desk
description: Rara as the trading interface — ask questions about setups, get trade ideas, execute orders, all through natural conversation in Telegram.

title: Post-Earnings Reassessment: GOOGL (Feb 4)
description: After GOOGL earnings on Feb 4, re-run scanner + vision analysis. Update trade plan. Currently: Flat Base 9/12, RS 85, conviction 57/100 (penalized).

title: Post-Earnings Reassessment: AMD (Feb 3)
description: AMD dropped 17% post-earnings. Played 200 MA bounce with $202.5 calls. Sold 2 at +$110 profit. Remaining 2 targeting $205.

title: Configure Brave Search API Key
description: Web search broken — needs Brave API key. Run: clawdbot configure --section web

title: Configure Memory Search (OpenAI/Google Key)
description: memory_search disabled — needs OpenAI or Google API key for embeddings. Required for long-term memory recall.

title: Build Backtest Engine
description: 5 backtest modules built: core_data_loader, core_engine, core_pattern_detector, core_trade_simulator, run_backtest. 111.9% return over 5 years verified.

title: Build Scanner V3 (scanner_v3.py)
description: CANSLIM pattern scanner: detects Flat Base, Cup w/Handle, HTF, Ascending Base, Pocket Pivot, Double Bottom. Scores 0-12. Covers 71 tickers.

title: Build Money Scanner (money_scanner.py)
description: Ranks detected patterns 0-100 combining RS Rating, volume ratio, distance to buy point, sector/market adjustments.

title: Build Options Flow Scanner (options_flow_scanner.py)
description: Tracks unusual options activity. Distinguishes bullish/bearish/hedging. Measures premium and put/call ratio.

title: Build Signal Matcher (signal_matcher.py)
description: Combines all scanner outputs into a conviction score 0-100. Applies earnings penalty, bearish flow penalty. Generates final BUY/WATCH/AVOID signal.

title: Build Combo Scanner (combo_scanner.py)
description: Orchestrates scanner_v3 + money_scanner + options_flow + signal_matcher in one run.

title: Build Alert System (alert_system.py)
description: Alert system for scanner events. Notifications when signals fire.

title: Build Options Calculator (options_calc.py)
description: Options pricing calculator for trade planning.

title: Build Position Calculator (position_calc.py)
description: Position sizing calculator based on conviction, risk %, portfolio size.

title: Build Position Manager (position_manager.py)
description: Tracks open positions, P&L, stop losses, targets.

title: Build Trade Journal (journal.py)
description: Trade journaling system for tracking entries, exits, lessons learned.

title: Build Options Journal (options_journal.py)
description: Separate journal for options trades with Greeks tracking.

title: Build Unusual Activity Scanner (unusual_activity.py)
description: Detects unusual volume and options activity for early signal detection.

title: Build Scanner Stats (scanner_stats.py)
description: Historical stats and performance metrics for scanner signals.

title: Build Flow Dashboard (flow_dashboard.py)
description: Options flow visualization dashboard.

title: Build Morning Signals (morning_signals.py)
description: Pre-market signal generation for daily trade candidates.

title: Build Trade Execution (trade.py)
description: Trade execution module — will connect to Alpaca once API keys are provided.

title: Write PATTERN_GUIDE.md
description: Complete CANSLIM pattern reference guide with all 7 patterns, rules, concepts, position sizing, system overview.

title: Clawdbot Initial Setup & Identity
description: Set up Rara identity, SOUL.md, USER.md, IDENTITY.md, AGENTS.md. Connected via Telegram.

title: VCP Detection in Math Scanner
description: Scanner V3 can't detect VCPs algorithmically — requires AI Vision. Add mathematical VCP detection as future enhancement.

title: Automated Chart Screenshots via Cron
description: Set up cron to auto-run chart_screenshotter.py after each scan. Currently manual only.

title: NU Holdings — Monitor for $19.02 Breakout
description: NU is the cleanest setup: Ascending Base + VCP + Cup w/Handle, no earnings risk, conviction 70/100. Watch for breakout above $19.02 on 50%+ volume. Currently $17.75.

title: Set Up Telegram Notifications for Signals
description: When scanner detects a new high-conviction signal or breakout, automatically notify Rah via Telegram.

title: Quant Data vs Unusual Whales Research
description: Compared Quant Data ($59/mo) vs Unusual Whales for options flow analysis. Quant Data wins on data depth + includes Benzinga news. UW better for beginners/community.

title: Build Asymmetric Squeeze Watchlist
description: Created watchlist of high short interest + beaten down stocks for asymmetric plays. Includes PLUG, HTZ, SMR, SOUN, NVAX, RUN, SEDG, SPCE. Ranked by IV and volume. Saved to trading/asymmetric-watchlist.md.

title: AMD 200 MA Bounce Trade
description: Executed AMD $202.5 calls (2/6 exp) on 200 MA bounce. Entry: $4.65 x 4 contracts. Sold 2 at $5.20 (+$110 realized). Holding 2 for $205 target. First gamma-based trade using Quant Data.

title: ARKK Range Trade (Stock)
description: Bought ARKK stock for range play $70-74. Using gamma levels from Quant Data. Targets: T1 $72, T2 $74. Stop below $69. Stock instead of options due to choppy setup.

title: HOOD Gamma Analysis
description: Analyzed HOOD gamma structure: negative gamma at $75, $80, $85. Price broke $80 support, cascading to $78. MVC at $85. Used for real-time trade planning.

title: Write Quant Data Learning Guide
description: Created comprehensive guide on using Quant Data: 4 key panels (Gamma, Delta, Interval Map, Heat Map), daily workflow, trade setups (breakout, range, MVC fade), checklist. Delivered via Telegram.

title: M&A Acquisition Target Search
description: Searched for government IT contractors, MSPs, HVAC businesses per Rah's criteria. Found IT Staffing w/ Govt Contracts ($4.5M, $1.1M CF) as top lead. Saved to business/acquisition-search-results.md.

title: AMD Remaining Calls — Exit by Thu 11 AM
description: 2 remaining AMD $202.5c (2/6 exp). Must exit by Thursday 11 AM due to theta decay. Target: $205 ($7-7.50 premium). Stop: Below $199.

title: Contact Synergy BB — IT Staffing Lead
description: Reach out to Synergy Business Brokers about IT Staffing w/ Govt Contracts listing. Request: 3yr financials, contract vehicles, backlog, set-aside status.

title: Quant Data 7-Day Trial
description: Sign up for Quant Data free trial to practice gamma/GEX analysis workflow. Apply learnings from guide.
